meanings.definition: To exceed in quality or quantity.
meanings.sent1: She will surpass all expectations in her performance.
meanings.sent2: The student worked hard to surpass his previous test score.
meanings.sent3: The race was so close that the winner had to surpass the finish line by just a hair.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and generosity surpass all boundaries.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset surpassed anything she had ever seen before.

meanings.definition: To go beyond in achievement or excellence.
meanings.sent1: With determination, he will surpass all obstacles in his path.
meanings.sent2: The team's effort to surpass their rivals paid off in the end.
meanings.sent3: The chef's attempt to surpass his own cooking skills led to a hilarious kitchen disaster.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for music surpassed all other interests in her life.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's dedication to training surpassed everyone's expectations.
